updates.message: The problem with MyMathLab should now be resolved. We apologize for the inconvenience caused and we thank you again for your patience. Please rest assured that system reliability is a top priority at Pearson, and we are making continuous improvements to make our systems better. Affected users were experiencing a general slowdown of the service. Only users accessing the service from Australia were affected.

We have found a solution to the problem affecting some users on MyMathLab, and a target resolution time has now been set. The solution should be applied on the 4th of May 2015 at 04:15 GMT. Please note that this time frame is an estimate and may change. Affected users are experiencing a general slowdown of the service. Only users accessing the service from Australia are affected.

We are still working hard on resolving the issue that some users are currently experiencing on MyMathLab. We thank you for your continued patience. Affected users are experiencing a general slowdown of the service. Only users accessing the service from Australia are affected.

We are now able to confirm that some users are currently experiencing issues with MyMathLab. We are working on a solution and we thank you for your patience. Affected users are experiencing a general slowdown of the service. Only users accessing the service from Australia are affected.
We have received reports of potential issues with MyMathLab which we are now investigating. We will provide an update shortly.

The problem with MyMathLab should now be resolved. We apologize for the inconvenience caused and we thank you again for your patience. Please rest assured that system reliability is a top priority at Pearson, and we are making continuous improvements to make our systems better. All users should now be able to log on.

We have found a solution to the problem affecting most users on MyMathLab, and a target resolution time has now been set. The solution should be applied on the 09th of April 2015 at 15:00 GMT. Please note that this time frame is an estimate and may change. Affected users are experiencing difficulty logging into MyMathLab.

We are now able to confirm that most users are currently experiencing issues with MyMathLab. We are working on a solution and we thank you for your patience. Affected users are experiencing difficulty logging into MyMathLab.
We have received reports of potential issues with MyMathLab which we are now investigating. We will provide an update shortly.
